Name: Battle Imagine - Inferno Ogre
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Inferno Ogre's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Flame Roar.

Arcane! Flame Roar
Summon Boss: Inferno Ogre to spew flames forward, dealing Attack Damage to the target while healing yourself. 100% of excess healing converts into a Shield lasting for 20s.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Inferno Ogre's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Flame Roar.

Arcane! Flame Roar
Summon Boss: Inferno Ogre to spew flames forward, dealing Attack Damage to the target while healing yourself. 100% of excess healing converts into a Shield lasting for 20s.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
